statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.headline: Hofstra 83, Iona 75
article.story: HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. -- Mike Moore scored 24 points and Nathaniel Lester 21 to lead Hofstra to an 83-75 victory over Iona on Thursday night. The Pride (6-7) ended the first half with a 21-6 run over the final 8:32 to take a 43-28 halftime lead. Moore, who came in averaging 21.2 points, 17th in the nation, had nine of Hofstra's points in the run and David Imes had six. Imes finished with 16 points and 15 rebounds for Hofstra, which led by at least seven the rest of the way to win its third consecutive game. Lester had 10 rebounds and Dwan McMillan added 10 points and nine assists. Lamont Jones scored 16 of his 20 points in the second half for the Gaels (10-3), who had won three straight, but they never got closer than seven points the rest of the way. Mike Glover had 20 points and 13 rebounds for Iona.
